name: Iceberg With Smoked-Bacon-and-Buttermilk Dressing
keywords: bacon, iceberg lettuce, tomato, low-carb, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 12 slices smoked bacon, diced into 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 cups) and fried

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the loose outer leaves from the heads of iceberg, and cut each into 4 wedges and place in the freezer for 10 minutes before serving, along with 4 serving plates.
Remove the chilled plates and arrange each with a circle of sliced tomatoes. Set a wedge in the center of each plate. Nap with 1/4 cup dressing.
Sprinkle bacon over each wedge. Serve immediately.
